## Responsibilities

A session chair at a scientific conferences:

- introduces topics and speakers
- facilitates questions
- manages time

<hr>

## Tasks Ahead of Time

- Offer to host a pre-meeting before your session with the speakers (or each independently if there are a small number) to
Check powerpoints/screen sharing
Explain timing
Check factual info, especially how to pronounce names
Consider reminding speakers to declare any conflicts on one slide (not common in research talks, but still good practice).
